home.tagline: Bloom your flower business with ease!
home.aboutContent1: Welcome to BloomBiz - your comprehensive solution for managing the flower business. We'll help you tackle the challenges in the floral industry so you can succeed in the market. Count on us to optimize your flower shop!
home.aboutContent2: At BloomBiz, we see potential for growth in every flower shop. Our goal is to simplify complex tasks so you can focus on what truly matters - creating stunning arrangements. Work with us to achieve excellence in the floral business!

featuresList.title: All-in-one solution
featuresList.description: BloomBiz is a multifunctional tool that provides access to all necessary features in one place.

featuresList.title: Intuitive Interface
featuresList.description: A simple and intuitive interface that allows easy access to essential functions without extra effort.

featuresList.title: Financial Control
featuresList.description: Convenient tools for managing the store's cash flow. Track your expenses and profits, analyze financial flows, and plan your expenditures effectively.

featuresList.title: Stock Management
featuresList.description: An efficient tool for controlling inventory levels and prices. Maintain detailed inventory records, conveniently analyze and plan purchases, all data available in one place.

featuresList.title: Dynamic Charts
featuresList.description: Automatically generated charts that reflect the status of your store. Easily analyze sales data, inventory levels, and other metrics.

featuresList.title: Customer Data
featuresList.description: Convenient storage of customer information for reuse and ensuring an entirely new level of customer service.

categories.deletionModalConsent: I understand that the category and all related products will be deleted.

settings.name: Settings
settings.title: YOUR STORE'S SETTINGS
settings.resetModalConfirmationMessage: All settings will be reset to default, are you sure?

orders.title: Orders
orders.safetyModeDescription: The 'Disassemble Order' function will not be available while this setting is active.
orders.hideOutOfStockDescription: Do not display out-of-stock products when creating an order.
orders.ignoreGoodsDescription: Products that will not be displayed when creating an order.
orders.ignoreCustomersDescription: Customers that will not be displayed when creating an order.
orders.statusesDescription: Statuses that can be associated with orders.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.safetyModeDescription: The expense deletion function will not be available while this setting is active.
expenses.ignoreSuppliersDescription: Suppliers that will not be displayed when creating an expense.
expenses.ignoreGoodsDescription: Products that will not be displayed when creating an expense.

goods.title: Products
goods.safetyModeDescription: The category and product deletion function will not be available while this setting is active.
goods.defaultMarginDescription: The margin used for automatic price calculation.
goods.resetPricesConfirmationMessage: All prices you have changed will be recalculated based on the default margin. This action cannot be undone.
goods.resetPricesDescription: All user-set prices will be reset and automatically recalculated by the system.

suppliers.title: Suppliers
suppliers.safetyModeDescription: The supplier deletion function will not be available while this setting is active.

customers.title: Customers
customers.safetyModeDescription: The customer deletion function will not be available while this setting is active.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: Here you can delete and add customers, as well as view various information about them.

formFields.addressesNote: Addresses can only be added to a customer when creating an order.

customers.deletionModalConfirmationMessage: All data related to this customer will be deleted, this action cannot be undone.

suppliers.title: Suppliers
suppliers.description: Here you can view, edit, and add new suppliers.
suppliers.deletionModalConfirmationMessage: All data related to this supplier will be deleted, this action cannot be undone.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.description: Here you can register and view your expenses. When adding a supply, new items will be added to your inventory.
expenses.deletionModalConfirmationMessage: All items related to this expense will also be removed from the inventory. This action cannot be undone.

stock.title: In-Stock Items
stock.description: Here you can view the items you have in stock and write them off. New items will be added to the stock immediately after registering a new expense.

orders.title: Orders
orders.description: Here you can add, edit, and view your clients' orders.
orders.deletionModalConfirmationMessage: All used goods will be returned to your stock. This action cannot be undone.

login.title: Login
login.description: Log in to your account to continue

passwordRules.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
passwordRules.capitalLetter: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
passwordRules.smallLetter: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
passwordRules.digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
